This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Cmd+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)

load("hauls_fulltempdata.Rdata")

```
New data table with unique values
```{r unique data table}
hauls2 <- unique(hauls, by = c("region", "year"))
```

Temp through time facet wrap
```{r temp facet}
#temperature through time
ggplot(data=hauls2, aes(x=year, y = min_sst_temp)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = min_sst_temp, col = "blue")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = max_sst_temp, col = "red")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = seas_sst_temp, col = "grey")) +
  labs(x="Year", y="Surface\n Temperature (˚C)") +
  ylim(0,25) +
  theme_classic() +
  facet_wrap (~region) +
  theme(text=element_text(size = 20))

summary(hauls2$seas_sst_temp)

#temperature through time
ggplot(data=hauls, aes(x=year, y=mean_sbt_temp, col = reg)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x="Year", y="Mean Annual Bottom\n Temperature (˚C)") +
  ylim(0,25) +
  geom_smooth(aes(col = reg), se = F, method = "lm") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(text=element_text(size = 20))
```
